title: Textile, late 19th–early 20th century
medium:
Medium: piña fiber, cotton
Technique: appliqué and embroidery on plain weave
description: Straight panels intended for sleeves with a small appliquéd and embroidered floral design. A wide border shows a  vine pattern along with a flower and vine pattern of appliqué pina outlined in white embroidery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, late 19th–early 20th century.Medium: piña fiber, cotton
Technique: appliqué and embroidery on plain weave. 1949-47-2-b.
